Message:
The Holy Night provides
a chance to express gratitude
to those you cherish.

But, there also exists
a certain legend.

It’s said that miracles happen
on the Holy Night,
granting the wishes of many...

And now, the Holy Night
is fast approaching.
I want to show Mister Apprentice
how thankful I am,

but I can’t seem to find
a suitable gift...

Suddenly, a girl draped
in a black cloak
appeared before me.

“The Shining Star
of Holy Darkness,
Stella, has arrived!

Come, let us uncover
the ancient covenant hidden
in the shadows of night!”

Hm. I think I get what
Stella’s trying to get at.

There’s a legend—making a wish
under a large tree on
the Holy Night grants a miracle
that will make it come true.

So, she’s saying, “We should
look into that mystery!”

A miracle that grants wishes
on the Holy Night, huh...?

Gifting magic sounds perfect
for a master like me,

and that would be just the right gift
for Mister Apprentice!
